title: The Library story
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Milan Herzog
brief_description: Shows the various services provided by a modern public library. It dwells in the varied interests of regular readers, children, teenagers, blind people and those interested in music. Illustrates the various rooms and parts of the library which include a children’s room, a conference room, a reference room, the catalogue and facilities for reading microfilm.
